Thanks for the confidence in my work though!

@aantonop @cardano_apps @Cardano @InputOutputHK @Bitcoin @sol3gga The extended UTXO model is a really cool innovation from Bitcoin's model, the way we used formal specifications for ledger rules and the design of the network stack are also gems.
